name: R5-ElementDefinition-R4-ElementDefinition
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 ElementDefinition into FHIR R4

element.display: Definition of an element in a resource or extension

target.display: Definition of an element in a resource or extension
target.comment: R5 `ElementDefinition` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ElementDefinition`
R5 `ElementDefinition.alias` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ElementDefinition.alias`
R5 `ElementDefinition.base` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ElementDefinition.base`
R5 `ElementDefinition.base.extension` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ElementDefinition.base.extension`
R5 `ElementDefinition.base.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ElementDefinition.base.id`

element.display: Max cardinality of the base element

target.display: Max cardinality of the base element
target.comment: R5 `ElementDefinition.base.max` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ElementDefinition.base.max`

element.display: Min cardinality of the base element

target.display: Min cardinality of the base element
target.comment: R5 `ElementDefinition.base.min` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ElementDefinition.base.min`

element.display: Path that identifies the base element

target.display: Path that identifies the base element
target.comment: R5 `ElementDefinition.base.path` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ElementDefinition.base.path`

element.display: ValueSet details if this is coded

target.display: ValueSet details if this is coded
target.comment: R5 `ElementDefinition.binding` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ElementDefinition.binding`

element.display: Additional Bindings - more rules about the binding
Whether binding can applies to all repeats, or just one
Documentation of the purpose of use of the binding
maximum | minimum | required | extensible | candidate | current | preferred | ui | starter | component
Qualifies the usage - jurisdiction, gender, workflow status etc.
The value set for the additional binding
Intended use of codes in the bound value set

target.display: Human explanation of the value set
target.comment: R5 `ElementDefinition.binding.description` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ElementDefinition.binding.description` - description has change due to type change: R5 description markdown has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 description
R5 `ElementDefinition.binding.extension` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ElementDefinition.binding.extension`
R5 `ElementDefinition.binding.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ElementDefinition.binding.id`

R5 `ElementDefinition.binding.strength` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ElementDefinition.binding.strength` - strength has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/binding-strength|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/binding-strength|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
R5 `ElementDefinition.binding.valueSet` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ElementDefinition.binding.valueSet`
R5 `ElementDefinition.code` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ElementDefinition.code`

target.display: Why this constraint is necessary or appropriate
target.comment: R5 `ElementDefinition.constraint.requirements` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ElementDefinition.constraint.requirements` - requirements has change due to type change: R5 requirements markdown has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 requirements

R5 `ElementDefinition.constraint.severity` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ElementDefinition.constraint.severity` - severity has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/constraint-severity|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/constraint-severity|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
